title: West African Doctors Plead For Access To Experimental Ebola Serum
teaser: The Ebola outbreak has taken a particularly high toll on health workers, with more than 100 cases of health workers infected with the disease. West Africans are now requesting access to experimental drugs that have been used on Western health workers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
